parent.description: Register for Self Assessment, sign in and send your Self Assessment tax return online
parent.title: Register for and file your Self Assessment tax return

choose_sign_in.title: Prove your identity to continue
choose_sign_in.description: You can't file online until you've activated Government Gateway account using your Unique Taxpayer Reference(UTR).

options.hint_text: You'll have a user ID if you've registered to file your Self Assessment tax return online before.
You'll have an account if you've proved your identity with a certified company, such as the Post Office.

create_new_account.title: Create an account
create_new_account.body:
To use this service, you need to create either a Government Gateway or GOV.UK Verify account. These are used to help fight identity theft.

Once you have an account, you can use it to access other government services online.

Choose a way to prove your identity

Government Gateway

Registering with Government Gateway usually takes about 10 minutes. It works best if you have:

  • your National Insurance number
  • a recent payslip or a P60 or valid UK passport
Create a Government Gateway account
